item.title: 📝 gbajaj/interviewready (44 ⭐)
item.description:
👤 Owner: gbajaj

📝 Repository: gbajaj/interviewready

📄 Descrizione: InterviewReady is an Android project skeleton for coding interviews. It saves setup time by providing a pre-configured Kotlin, Jetpack Compose, MVVM foundation with Retrofit, Coil, and StateFlow. Focus on problem-solving, not boilerplate, with ready-to-use structure and UI states.
